name: heart-stamp
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black-white: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.
